about: A passionate software developer with a strong focus on delivering high-quality applications. Experienced in building innovative solutions that enhance user experience and business efficiency. Adept at working in dynamic environments, collaborating with teams, and continuously learning to improve and adapt to new challenges. Specialized in Flutter development and eCommerce applications with expertise in mobile and web platforms.

projects.title: Maria Taxi (Driver Redesigned)
projects.description_short: A comprehensive taxi and transportation service with redesigned driver interface offering four main services including taxi, bus, and tourism transportation.
projects.description_long: The Maria Taxi project is a comprehensive transportation platform consisting of two Flutter applications - one for customers and another for drivers. The platform provides four essential services: Taxi Service where customers can request rides and drivers can accept requests while navigating passengers to their destinations; General Bus Service allowing customers to view available trips and book seats while drivers manage trip details; Tourism Bus Service offering organized travel options specifically for tourism trips; and School Bus Service which is currently under development. The driver application features a redesigned interface with enhanced functionality for managing trips, accepting ride requests, and providing seamless navigation services. My contribution involved developing the complete driver application with all key functionalities for managing trips and accepting ride requests, while also implementing several screen designs in the customer application to ensure optimal user experience.

projects.title: Maria Taxi – Customer and Driver Applications
projects.description_short: Complete transportation platform with dual applications for customers and drivers, offering taxi, bus, and tourism services.
projects.description_long: Maria Taxi is a comprehensive transportation ecosystem built with Flutter, featuring separate applications for customers and drivers. The platform delivers four core services: a Taxi Service enabling customers to request rides while drivers can accept and navigate passengers efficiently; a General Bus Service where customers browse available trips and book seats while drivers manage and update trip information; a Tourism Bus Service providing specialized organized travel experiences for tourists; and a School Bus Service currently in active development. This dual-app approach ensures optimized user experiences for both service providers and consumers, with seamless integration between customer requests and driver operations. My role involved leading the development of the complete driver application, implementing all essential functionalities for trip management and ride request handling, while also contributing to the customer application by developing multiple screen designs to ensure a cohesive user experience across both platforms.

projects.title: Fashion – Modular eCommerce Application
projects.description_short: A flexible modular eCommerce platform for web and mobile that streamlines online store creation and deployment.
projects.description_long: Fashion represents a cutting-edge modular eCommerce platform designed for both web and mobile environments, engineered to revolutionize the process of creating and deploying online stores. The platform features a flexible, component-based architecture that enables rapid customization and deployment of eCommerce applications tailored to diverse business requirements. With its modular design approach, Fashion allows businesses to quickly adapt their online presence, scale their operations efficiently, and customize their digital storefronts without extensive development overhead. The platform serves as a comprehensive foundation for building robust eCommerce solutions that can evolve with changing business needs. My contribution focused on developing the mobile section of the platform, ensuring the application framework is highly adaptable and easily customizable for building mobile eCommerce applications quickly and efficiently.

projects.title: EpiHope – Epilepsy Patients Health Tracking Application
projects.description_short: Comprehensive healthcare application for epilepsy patients and doctors with health tracking, medication management, and research access.
projects.description_long: EpiHope is a sophisticated healthcare management application specifically designed to support epilepsy patients and medical professionals in effectively managing health information and medication regimens. The platform features two specialized portals: the Doctor's Portal provides healthcare professionals with access to the latest medication research articles and cutting-edge epilepsy-related studies, keeping them informed about treatment advances; the Patient's Portal empowers patients with access to the same research materials while offering comprehensive tools for tracking health episodes, monitoring symptoms, and managing medication schedules with automated reminder systems. The project encompasses an advanced Admin Dashboard built with Next.js, providing administrators with powerful content management capabilities to maintain and update the platform's extensive medical resources. My contribution involved collaborating on the admin dashboard development, creating comprehensive article management functionality including creation, deletion, editing, and publishing features, while also developing the complete patient-side features in the Flutter application, focusing on health episode tracking, medication management, and reminder systems to enhance patient care and treatment adherence.

projects.title: Ataa-Electrician App
projects.description_short: Flutter-based eCommerce application for electricians to browse, purchase products from vendors, and earn rewards.
projects.description_long: The Ataa eCommerce Electrician App is an innovative Flutter-based application inspired by modular eCommerce principles, serving as part of a comprehensive two-application ecosystem. While one application empowers vendors to manage their products and services efficiently, the Ataa Electrician App provides electricians with a seamless platform to browse vendor catalogs, discover products, and make purchases with an integrated rewards system. The application features an intuitive interface for viewing vendor profiles and their product offerings, a streamlined shopping cart system for easy product selection, a secure and efficient checkout process, and a points-based rewards program that allows electricians to earn benefits from vendor partnerships, creating a mutually beneficial ecosystem for all stakeholders. My role involved developing the complete electrician-facing application with a focus on user experience optimization for the trade professional market, implementing the vendor browsing system, shopping cart functionality, secure checkout process, and the innovative points-based rewards system that incentivizes continued platform engagement.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Specialized in eCommerce applications, building scalable solutions for online businesses. Developed and maintained applications for both mobile and web platforms. Built and contributed to several admin dashboards, implementing CRUD operations. Integrated Google Maps and tracking functionalities for real-time location services. Worked on delivery and logistics solutions, enhancing route optimization and live tracking. Integrated payment methods such as Zain Cash and other online payment gateways for seamless transactions. Ensured secure payment processing and compliance with industry standards.

experience.title: Flutter Developer
experience.description: Designed, developed, and deployed Mobile apps using Flutter. Created Invoice Management App & Admin Panel system for managing invoices, billing, and payments. Developed Home-Working App & Admin Panel platform for connecting freelancers with job opportunities. Ensured cross-platform compatibility and seamless performance across devices. Implemented authentication, data management, and backend integrations. Collaborated with teams to align business logic with front-end development.

education.description: Advanced studies in web technologies, software engineering principles, and modern development practices. Focus on web science methodologies and cutting-edge technologies in software development.

Comprehensive study of network engineering principles, computer systems, and software development fundamentals. Strong foundation in computer networks, system administration, and software engineering practices.
